text: <@U2W7U5UA3|pd93> uploaded a file: <https://hyperledgerproject.slack.com/files/pd93/F3T52MDRD/___npm_install_hfc_-s__log.sh|"$ npm install hfc -S" log> and commented: Really struggling to get HFC installed for some reason. I have Node v7.4.0 and NPM v4.0.5 on Windows. It seems to get stuck doing something with GRPC. Any help would be appreciated.

initial_comment.comment: Really struggling to get HFC installed for some reason. I have Node v7.4.0 and NPM v4.0.5 on Windows. It seems to get stuck doing something with GRPC. Any help would be appreciated.

text: I seem to recall problems with hfc and node 7.x
There is an issue with GRPC npm module which hfc depends on while using Node 7.x.
in hfc package.json, grpc module is fix referenced to 1.0.0. this issue is resolved in grpc 1.0.1. So, in hfc package.json, this should be updated to 1.0.1
